meanings.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a kilogram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the flour in grammes for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scale showed the weight in grammes.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse weighed only a few grammes.
meanings.sent4: Her love for baking weighed more than a million grammes.
meanings.sent5: The grammes of sugar sparkled like tiny diamonds in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small unit of weight in the metric system.
meanings.sent1: The baby weighed a few grammes at birth.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store sold fruits by the grammes.
meanings.sent3: The grammes of rice danced in the measuring cup.
meanings.sent4: His words carried the same weight as a million grammes.
meanings.sent5: The grammes of sand slipped through her fingers like time itself.
